mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales (warehouse_name, sales_date, category, client_name, amount, description) VALUES (#{warehouseName}, #{salesDate}, #{category}, #{clientName}, #{amount}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sales_id = #{id} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.update: UPDATE sales SET warehouse_name = #{warehouseName}, sales_date = #{salesDate}, category = #{category}, client_name = #{clientName}, amount = #{amount}, description = #{description}, mod_date = NOW() WHERE sales_id = #{id} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(sales_date) AS month, SUM(amount) AS totalSales FROM sales WHERE YEAR(sales_date) = #{year} AND status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY MONTH(sales_date)
